text: Kujha loka ajihe hana jihare alaha tom' bina dusari'am nu usa de rabara kharha karade hana. Uha uhana nala ajiha prema rakhade hana jiho jiha pi'ara' alaha nala rakhana cahida hai. Ate jo imana vale hana, uha sabha tom vadha alaha nu hi pi'ara karade hana. Ate jekara uha ati'acari usa sasame' nu dekha laina, jadom uha saza vica jakare honage, tam uha samajha lainde ki sari di sari sakati alaha di hi hai. Ate alaha bahuta sakhata saza dena vala hai
